content.raw:
I think we're in agreement about the convention, but I'm still not sure if `{xyz_PM}` is the correct notation. If we have a vector, `p_{P}` in the parent link frame and wanted to express it in the model frame, we'd simply multiply the pose of the parent link with the vector right? So if the pose of the parent link is `X_{PM}` this product would be:

`p_{M} = X_{PM} * p_{P}`

Doesn't the convention suggest

`p_{M} = X_{MP} * p_{P}`

with `X_{MP}` instead of `X_{PM}`?
